column1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Add fettuccini and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.

column2: melt butter into cream over low heat.

column1: Stir in cheese over medium heat until melted; this will thicken the sauce.
Use enough of the pasta so that all of the sauce is used and the pasta is thoroughly coated.
